GLOBAL_AT_VENICE - Research and Training for Global Challenges

From: 26-04-2022 10:00
To: 05-08-2022 13:00

IMPORTANT: Please note that if you made an application in the first call (2021) and your score in the Evaluation Summary Report was less than 70%, you cannot reapply for this call.


Visit the G@V website for more information, and to download the Call for Proposals and the Application Guidelines.

item.title: SPIN 2024 Standard Project
item.description:
Supporting Principal INvestigators

From: 24-04-2024 10:00
To: 10-06-2024 13:00

SPIN - Supporting Principal INvestigators - Call for applications 2024


Visit the SPIN website for more information.


The SPIN 2024 call addresses applicants holding a position at Ca’ Foscari, who intend to submit a research project proposal meeting international excellence standards, bringing innovation within a chosen scientific area, and able to strengthen project management capacities of the applicant for a possible participation in future competitive calls for proposals at international level.

The 2024 call, in particular, aims to encourage collaboration with the universities of the EUTOPIA alliance.
